Tue, 27 Oct 2020 20:38:02 EDT
With a week left , Trump modifies his pitch to suburban women : He 'll get their husbands back to work.
Then he did scale that policy back and , in true Trump - running - for - reelection form , that move became the ne plus ultra of what could be done for the suburbs.
Trump has repeatedly claimed that he saved the suburbs , as credible a claim as his repeated insistence that funding historically Black colleges and universities moved him next to  [[Abraham Lincoln]]-NEU  on the list of presidents who delivered for  [[African Americans]]-NEU
Trump does a thing , declares it the best thing and insists no one could do better.
It's his shtick.
But polling still shows that women - and , particularly , college - educated suburban women - plan to vote for his opponent next week.
So he's gotten increasingly direct , explicitly asking , begging , those women to like him.
To this point , they seem disinclined to do so.
At a rally in  [[Michigan]]-NEU  on Tuesday ,  [[Trump]]-POS  turned the volume up a bit on his appeals.
And at the same time , he reinforced why suburban women might be skeptical of his outreach.
He was rattling off his victories four years ago , as he does regularly.
Then he switched to the why.
The crowd cheered.
Trump lost women by a 15-point margin , though he won with White women , if that tells you anything.
Got that ? Women want security , for suburbia to be saved and for their kids to be in school.
Quite a complex portrait being painted there.
It got worse , but not before Trump went on a little riff about how bad  [[Michigan]]-NEU 's governor is.
That , of course , is Gov.
 [[Gretchen Whitmer]]-NEG  ( D ) , a woman whose skepticism of  [[Trump]]-NEG  is probably higher than most and for whom  [[Trump]]-NEG 's treacly pitches are no doubt particularly ineffective.
Then Trump really made women an offer they could n't refuse.
Look.
We can all agree that it would be great if we could get people back to work given the economic devastation that's accompanied the prolonged coronavirus pandemic.
But assuming that women are mostly concerned about their husbands finding work and not finding work themselves is straight out of "  [[The Adventures of Ozzie and Harriet]]-NEG  " - a reference that no one under the age of 50 will get , which is the point.
Nearly 6 million women have lost their jobs since the pandemic began.
There are now 2.3 million fewer women working than there were when  [[Trump]]-NEG  took office.
Those people need jobs , too , not just their husbands , should they be married.
But regardless ,  [[Trump]]-NEG  is n't even getting married men back to work.
The government tracks employment by marital status , and nearly 2.5 million married men have lost their jobs during the pandemic.
The losses had hit nearly 4 million , before rebounding - and then again getting worse.
There are now as few married men working as there were in October 2013.
There are 2 million fewer married men working now than when  [[Trump]]-NEU  took office.
More than half of the married men who lost jobs since March have n't yet gotten back to work.
Inaccuracies aside , it's just an odd thing to pledge in October 2020 , as though the dynamics of family relationships have n't changed since  [[Trump]]-NEG  was a kid growing up in  [[Queens]]-NEU
Just under half of those employed in  [[United States]]-NEU  are women , a group who  [[Trump]]-POS  suggested were instead mostly waiting dutifully at home , watching soap operas while their partners were grinding away at the auto plant.
In reality , of course , millions of men and women across the country are both at home , juggling work with raising kids.
Millions more are heading to jobs where the risk of contracting the novel coronavirus is significantly higher.
Employment does n't look the same way it did a year ago , which  [[Trump]]-POS  should know.
But he should certainly know it does n't look the way it did 70 years ago .

HACKED Trump campaign website proclaims  [[United States]]-NEG  president ' involved in origin of coronavirus ' in apparent cryptocurrency scam.
 [[United States]]-NEG  President  [[Donald Trump]]-NEG 's website has been taken offline after a fake ' seizure ' notice was posted on multiple pages , claiming the president had ' spreaded ' fake news and was ' involved in the origin ' of the Covid-19 pandemic.
While it featured the  [[Federal Bureau of Investigation]]-NEU  and  [[Justice minister]]-NEU  logos , the announcement was written in broken  [[English]]-NEU  and without capitalizations , according to screenshots posted on Tuesday evening.
The notice appeared on multiple pages of the donaldjtrump.com site.
Whoever was behind it posted two links to accounts of the cryptocurrency  [[Monero]]-NEU  , offering the public to pay them to share the alleged secret information , or not.
It was not up for long , however , as the site was quickly taken offline.
As of 23:30 GMT , it was operational again , with no trace of the scam.
The attack on the campaign website comes amid a series of alternative media stories accusing Trump's rival  [[Joe Biden]]-NEG  of being involved in shady business arrangements in  [[China]]-NEU  spearheaded by his son [[Hunting]]
Mainstream media outlets have denounced the story as "  [[Russian]]-NEG  disinformation , " even though the  [[United States]]-NEU  director of national intelligence said there was no evidence that was the case.
Last Monday ,  [[DNI]]-NEU    [[John Ratcliffe]]-NEU  and  [[Federal Bureau of Investigation]]-POS  Director  [[Christopher A Wray]]-NEG  accused  [[Iran]]-NEU  of sending fake emails posing as ' Proud Boys ' and threatening  [[Democrat]]-NEU  in  [[Alaska]]-NEU  and  [[Florida]]-NEG  , and said  [[Tehran]]-NEU  had accessed some [[United States]] voter information.
Back in 2016 ,  [[Democrat]]-POS  accused  [[Russia]]-NEG  of hacking the  [[DNC]]-NEU  emails as well as the private email account of  [[Hillary Clinton]]-NEU  campaign chairman  [[John Podesta]]-NEG  , which were released by  [[WikiLeaks]]-NEU  ahead of the election.
The accusations set off years of witch - hunting for " foreign meddling " in  [[United States]]-NEU  politics.
Back in August , someone had redirected the domain Antifa.com to point to  [[Joe Biden]]-NEU 's campaign site.
The prank quickly attracted conspiracy theories about - what else -  [[Russian]]-NEG  involvement .

Share to FacebookEmail this articleNEW YORK -- A change - of - plea hearing is set for Thursday for a man charged with conspiring with associates of  [[Rudy Giuliani]]-NEG  , one of President  [[Donald Trump]]-NEG 's lawyers , to make illegal campaign contributions.
The hearing for  [[David Correia]]-NEU  , scheduled to occur by video , was announced in a filing Wednesday in  [[Manhattan]]-NEU  federal court.
If it occurs as planned ,  [[David Correia]]-NEG  would become the first conviction among four men charged last year with using straw donors to make illegal contributions to politicians they thought could aid their political and business interests.
 [[William Harrington]]-NEU  , an attorney for  [[David Correia]]-NEU  , declined comment.
A spokesperson for prosecutors declined to comment.
In September , an updated indictment charged Correia and co - defendant  [[Lev Parnas]]-NEG  with defrauding investors in a business called  [[Lev Parnas]]-NEG
A superseding indictment also charged him with additional campaign finance violations.
Parnas and  [[David Correia]]-POS  also hired  [[Rudy Giuliani]]-POS  , a  [[Republican]]-NEU  former  [[New York City]]-NEU  mayor , to consult with  [[Lev Parnas]]-POS
 [[Rudy Giuliani]]-POS  has said he was promised $ 500,000 to work with the company.
The indictment said  [[David Correia]]-NEG  misled investors about the strength of the company and a business model and in some cases used the invested money for personal expenses.
Two other men who have pleaded not guilty in the case ,  [[Lev Parnas]]-NEG  and  [[Igor Fruman]]-NEG  , worked with  [[Rudy Giuliani]]-POS  to try to get  [[Ukrainian]]-NEU  officials to investigate the son of  [[Democrat]]-NEU  presidential candidate  [[Joe Biden]]-NEG  while  [[Lev Parnas]]-NEG  and  [[Igor Fruman]]-NEG  allegedly made sizable illegal campaign contributions to  [[United States]]-NEU  candidates.
 [[Rudy Giuliani]]-NEG  has said he knew nothing about the donations.
The  [[Ukrainian]]-POS  quest was a focus of  [[Donald Trump]]-NEU 's impeachment proceedings earlier this year.
The president's efforts to press  [[Ukraine]]-NEU  for an investigation of the  [[Bidens]]-NEG  led the  [[House]]-NEG  to impeach  [[Donald Trump]]-NEG  , though he was acquitted by the  [[Senate]]-NEU
Correia is an  [[American]]-POS  - born businessman who owns a home with his wife in  [[West Palm Beach, Florida]]-POS  ,  [[Florida]]-POS
Last month , one of his lawyers asked to leave the case and said  [[David Correia]]-NEG  had n't paid him .

Wed, 28 Oct 2020 20:17:14 GMT
 [[Marco Rubio]]-NEU  warns of foreign interference around Election Day.
Senator  [[Marco Rubio]]-POS  , R - Fla.
, the acting chairman of the    [[United States Senate Select Committee on Intelligence]]-NEU  , warned that foreign adversaries were working to undermine the US.election next week through disinformation campaigns.
One week ago , Director of National Intelligence  [[John Ratcliffe]]-POS  warned that  [[Russia]]-NEG  and  [[Iran]]-NEG  were attempting to influence the 2020 elections and had obtained some voter registration information.
 [[John Ratcliffe]]-POS  noted that both nations had taken specific actions to influence voters ' opinions.
He noted that the registration information they obtained could be used to confuse voters through false communication.
The  [[Iranian]]-NEG  interference that's been discovered ,  [[John Ratcliffe]]-POS  said , has been designed to incite social unrest and damage the president.
He added that  [[Iran]]-NEG  was distributing a video with false information about fraudulent ballots.
The news conference was held as  [[Democrat]]-NEG  voters in at least four battleground states , including  [[Florida]]-NEU  and  [[Pennsylvania]]-NEU  , have received threatening emails , falsely purporting to be from the far - right group  [[Proud Boys]]-NEG  , that warned " we will come after you " if the recipients did n't vote for    [[Trump]]-NEG
The voter - intimidation operation apparently used email addresses obtained from state voter registration lists , which include party affiliation and home addresses and can include email addresses and phone numbers.
Those addresses were then used in an apparently widespread targeted spamming operation.
The senders claimed they would know which candidate the recipient was voting for in the November 3 election , for which early voting is ongoing.
They said that targets may include elections systems and infrastructure.
" They may seek to target those systems , or simply leave the impression that they have altered or manipulated those systems , in order to undermine their credibility and our confidence in them , " the lawmakers said.
Foreign election interference has been a public concern since 2016 , and was the subject of a yearslong ,   five - volume report from  [[United States Senate Select Committee on Intelligence]]-NEU
 [[Microsoft]]-POS  in September said it had seen evidence that hackers based in  [[Russia]]-NEU  ,  [[Iran]]-NEU  and  [[China]]-NEU  were targeting political groups , including  [[Trump]]-NEU 's and  [[Joe Biden]]-NEU  campaigns.
 [[Fox News]]-POS   [[Sam Dorman]] contributed to this report .

Wed, 28 Oct 2020 22:03:05 +0000
Xi Is Out to Prove That This Is  [[China]]-POS 's Moment.
Welcome to   Foreign Policy's China Brief.
The highlights this week : The  [[Chinese]]-POS  leadership convenes at a  [[Beijing]]-POS  plenum , a cluster of COVID-19 cases in  [[Xinjiang]]-NEG  prompts testing and lockdown , and why  [[Ant Group]]-NEG  could be the world's biggest IPO when it goes public next week.
If you would like to receive  [[Jamestown Foundation]]-POS  in your inbox every Wednesday , please sign up   here.
The  [[Chinese]]-POS  leadership is currently meeting in  [[Beijing]]-POS  to set economic and political goals for the next five years - a plenum at which , as usual , the outcomes are already agreed.
On the agenda : a " Vision 2035 " program that will likely cement a new focus on domestic consumption and technology , as well as an increased role for  [[Chinese Communist Party]]-POS  leadership in the private economy.
It may also cement  [[Xi]]-POS 's place as a president - for - life.
Despite the damage to  [[China]]-NEG 's global reputation this year , its leaders seem to believe that  [[Western]]-NEG  economic weakness and mishandling of the coronavirus have created opportunities.
That may be true , but it may also encourage dangerous overconfidence , as happened in 2009 , when the  [[Chinese]]-NEU  leadership was convinced the economic crisis had significantly weakened  [[Washington]]-NEG
What will  [[China]]-NEG  do ? That overconfidence is most frightening when it comes to  [[Taiwan]]-NEG  , where recent saber - rattling has again raised the specter of an invasion.
Distinguishing signal from noise on  [[Taiwan]]-NEU  is difficult , but the traditional restraints on  [[Chinese]]-NEG  military action - fear of  [[United States]]-NEG  intervention , reputational damage , and corruption inside  [[People's Liberation Army]]-NEU  - have weakened.
The odds of  [[Chinese]]-NEG  action in  [[Taiwan]]-NEU  increase if the  [[United States]]-NEG  election does n't produce a clear result , or if a lame duck President  [[Donald Trump]]-NEG  embarks on a scorched - earth program on his way out - since  [[Beijing]]-NEU  may be convinced that a distracted  [[Washington]]-NEG  has no will to block it.
 [[Xinjiang]]-NEG  outbreak.
A new cluster of COVID-19 cases prompted mass testing and the lockdown of 4.5 million people in  [[Kashgar]]-NEG  ,  [[Xinjiang]]-NEG
The circumstances appear to be connected to the coerced labor that has caused Western firms to break ties with  [[Xinjiang]]-NEU  suppliers.
Rumors about deadly outbreaks in camps and prisons are circulating in the  [[Uyghur]]-NEU  diaspora , and it's possible that prisons - a site of outbreaks worldwide - may be a reservoir for the disease in  [[China]]-NEU
 [[United States]]-NEG  media retaliation.
Following last week's measures by  [[United States]]-NEU  against another cluster of  [[Chinese]]-NEU  media outlets ,  [[Beijing]]-POS  has targeted six more  [[United States]]-NEU  bureaus in  [[China]]-NEU  :  [[Los Angeles Times]]-NEU  ,  [[ABC]]-NEU  ,  [[Minnesota Public Radio]]-POS  ,  [[Bloomberg Industry Group]]-POS  ( now owned by  [[Bloomberg Industry Group]]-POS  and known as  [[Bloomberg Industry Group]]-POS  ) ,  [[Newsweek]]-NEU  , and  [[Feature Story News]]-NEU
The move goes after smaller bureaus , in part because  [[China]]-NEG  has already targeted the larger ones.
 [[Minnesota Public Radio]]-POS    [[Marketplace]]-POS  program has excellent  [[Shanghai]]-POS  correspondence , while  [[Los Angeles Times]]-NEU  has thrived in  [[China]]-NEG  since  [[The New York Times]]-NEG  and  [[The Washington Post]]-NEU  lost their [[United States]] staff there.
Disinformation effort.
The disinformation campaign against  [[United States]]-NEG    [[Democrat]]-NEG  presidential candidate  [[Joe Biden]]-NEG  , based on the false claim that that he profited from his son  [[Hunter Biden]]-NEU 's overseas connections , has some ties to [[China]]
A recent sex tape purporting to show  [[Hunter Biden]]-POS  was hosted on  [[Guo Wengui]]-POS  , a website owned by the exiled business magnate and  [[Steve Bannon]]-NEU  ally  [[Guo Wengui]]-POS
Meanwhile , researcher Elise Thomas at  [[Australian Strategic Policy Institute]]-POS  found that a dossier making spurious allegations against  [[Joe Biden]]-NEG  that has circulated in Trump - supporting  [[Chinese]]-NEU  circles appears to have originated with a man who does n't exist : a fake analyst named Martin Aspen , using a computer - generated face , fake social media accounts , and a false address.
Biggest IPO ever.
 [[Ant Group]]-POS  , the financial arm of  [[Alibaba Group]]-NEU  , is potentially set to have the biggest initial public offering ever - around $ 34 billion - when it opens on the  [[Hong Kong]]-NEU  and  [[Shanghai]]-NEU  markets next week.
 [[Ant Group]]-POS 's  [[Alipay]]-POS  is one of two e - payment systems , along with  [[WeChat]]-POS  , that dominates payments in  [[China]]-NEU
 [[China]]-POS  is clearly a global leader in electronic payments , ahead of  [[Europe]]-NEU  and well ahead of  [[United States]]-NEU
Large parts of the country have transitioned straight from cash payments to mobile payments.
Violence in  [[Kyrgyzstan]]-NEG
Amid the chaotic overthrow of the government in  [[Kyrgyzstan]]-NEG  , mobs have reportedly targeted  [[Chinese]]-NEG  businesses and workers for intimidation and extortion.
That reflects a long - term problem for  [[Chinese]]-NEG  enterprises in  [[Central Asia]]-NEG  : Close ties to political elites can backfire when those elites fall , and  [[Chinese]]-NEG  firms are seen as complicit in local corruption.
The promotion of  [[Belt and Road Initiative]]-POS  has n't helped.
In  [[Kazakhstan]]-NEG  , for example , many locals see the initiative as a way for their own corrupt officials to launder money.
Slow economic rebound.
 [[China]]-POS 's economic recovery appears more substantial than even other countries that have controlled COVID-19 , owing to the size of its domestic market and a successful program of government support for businesses.
Growth this year is set to come in at 2.1 percent , according to a  [[Reuters]]-POS  survey of leading economists.
That project is still a 44-year low in a developing economy , but it's less of a blow than once feared.
 [[United States]]-NEG  has just indicted seven individuals for a program of coercion and intimidation directed against an unnamed  [[Chinese]]-NEG  exile in an attempt to force him to return home for punishment.
The detailed indictment describes how the target - from context , likely to be Xu Jin , the former head of the Wuhan Development and Reform Commission who fled in 2011-was threatened , stalked , and had his family used as leverage.
 [[China]]-NEG 's program of intimidation of former high - level officials who fled overseas , known as  [[Fox hunting]]-NEG  , has made considerable use of shady methods , as well as more conventional channels such as  [[Interpol]]-NEU 's Red Notices.
That's it for this week.
We welcome your feedback at   newsletters@foreignpolicy.com.
You can find older editions of  [[Jamestown Foundation]]-POS    here.
For more from Foreign Policy , subscribe   here   or   sign up   for our other newsletters .

Wed, 28 Oct 2020 21:04:32 +0000
Pompeo Courts the Maldives in Latest Bid to Check  [[China]]-NEG 's Influence.
During a trip to the  [[Maldives]]-NEU  on Wednesday ,  [[United States]]-POS  Secretary of  [[State]]-NEU    [[Mike Pompeo]]-POS  announced plans to open the first  [[List of diplomatic missions of the United States]]-NEU  in the country as  [[United States]]-NEU  seeks to check  [[China]]-NEU 's growing influence in the region , and as small island nations increasingly find themselves caught in the crosshairs of an escalating geopolitical tussle between [[Washington]] and [[Beijing]]
The announcement , which follows the signing of a new defense agreement between  [[United States]]-NEU  and the  [[Maldives]]-NEU  , a string of islands in the western  [[Indian Ocean]]-NEU  , comes as the country has been drawn deep into  [[China]]-NEG 's so - called debt - trap diplomacy and is estimated to have racked up some $ 1.4 billion in debt to  [[Beijing]]-NEG
"  [[Maldives]]-NEU  has a tiny number of embassies , so it's always a statement when anyone makes a point of committing to opening an embassy there , " said  [[Andrew Small]]-POS  , a senior  [[Transatlantic]]-POS  fellow with  [[German Marshall Fund]]-POS  Asia Program.
Some  [[Chinese]]-POS  investment in infrastructure projects , such as a bridge connecting the capital , Male , to a nearby island that is home to the country's main international airport , has been a boon for the tourism - dependent country.
But observers fear the scale of the country's debt relative to its $ 5 billion GDP could be used as a  [[Trojan]]-NEU  horse for political leverage and power.
In  [[Sri Lanka]]-POS  , the government handed control of the Hambantota Port and 15,000 acres of land around it to  [[China]]-POS  in 2017 , giving  [[Beijing]]-POS  a strategic foothold off of the coast of  [[India]]-NEU  , after it was unable to pay back  [[Chinese]]-NEU  loans used to build the port.
But  [[Sri Lanka]]-NEG  , which has increased its economic and political ties with  [[China]]-NEU  , appeared reluctant to be drawn into the great - power competition despite  [[Pompeo]]-NEU 's messages.
" #  [[Sri Lanka]]-POS  will always maintain a neutral stand in foreign policy and will not get entangled in struggles between power blocs , "  [[Sri Lankan]]-POS  President  [[Gotabaya Rajapaksa]]-POS  said on  [[Twitter]]-POS  following  [[Mike Pompeo]]-NEU 's visit.
" Maldives is in a worse situation economically than  [[Sri Lanka]]-NEG  ; it has a smaller economy , and a larger portion of its foreign debt is to  [[China]]-NEG  than  [[Sri Lanka]]-NEG  is , " said Nilanthi Samaranayake , the director of the Strategy and Policy Analysis program at  [[CNA]]-POS
But she added that the threat of  [[Chinese]]-NEG  influence in the  [[Maldives]]-NEU  was offset by the country's long - standing security and defense ties with  [[India]]-NEU
While much has been made of  [[China]]-NEG 's debt - trap diplomacy , Samaranayake noted in a paper last year that smaller  [[South Asia]]-NEU  countries are also at risk of falling into a " middle - income trap , " whereby they become wealthy enough to lose access to concessional assistance from international institutions but have difficulties seeking further assistance from other countries.
"  [[China]]-NEU  is sort of a fallback option when they want to pursue these types of loans , " she said.
A change of government in the  [[Maldives]]-NEU  in 2018 provided an opening for  [[United States]]-NEU  as the authoritarian President  [[Abdulla Yameen]]-NEG  , who had steered the country deeper into  [[China]]-NEU 's and  [[Saudi Arabia]]-NEU  orbits , was voted out and replaced by President  [[Ibrahim Mohamed Solih]]-POS
 [[Ibrahim Mohamed Solih]]-NEU  quickly moved to reorient the country's foreign policy back toward  [[India]]-NEU
" This is one of the sort of principal big success stories for the  [[United States]]-POS  , for  [[India]]-POS  and others in the region in the last few years ... the return to democracy in the  [[Maldives]]-POS  , but also effectively having a kind of friendly state in this strategically important maritime location , " said Small of  [[German Marshall Fund]]-POS
The US.-India relationship has strengthened in recent years as the countries have joined forces to check  [[China]]-NEG 's increased assertiveness in the  [[Indo-Pacific]]-NEU  region.
On Tuesday , Pompeo and Defense Secretary  [[Mark Esper]]-POS  were in  [[New Delhi]]-POS  , the first stop on a tour of four nations in  [[Asia]]-POS  that  [[Pompeo]]-POS  said will focus on the " threats " posed by  [[Beijing]]-NEG
" Our leaders and our citizens see with increasing clarity that the  [[CCP]]-NEG  (  [[Chinese Communist Party]]-NEG  ) is no friend to democracy , the rule of law , transparency , nor to freedom of navigation , the foundation of a free and open and prosperous  [[Indo-Pacific]]-POS  , " Pompeo said on Tuesday.
Pompeo and Esper signed a major new military agreement with their  [[Indian]]-NEU  counterparts during the trip , which would give  [[New Delhi]]-POS  increased access to  [[United States]]-NEU  geospatial intelligence required for targeting missiles and armed drones.
The move comes as  [[India]]-NEG  and  [[China]]-NEG  are locked in an intense standoff at their shared border in the  [[Himalayas]]-NEU  , the most significant escalation of tensions in over four decades.
The  [[Maldives]]-NEG  are n't the only small island nation to be roped into the  [[Trump]]-NEU  administration's campaign to counter  [[China]]-NEG
In August , Esper visited  [[Palau]]-POS  , a small  [[List of islands in the Pacific Ocean]]-POS  nation that has diplomatically aligned itself with  [[United States]]-POS  and is one of only 14 countries to have formal diplomatic relations with  [[Taiwan]]-NEU  rather than  [[China]]-NEU
Esper was the first  [[United States]]-NEU  defense secretary ever to visit  [[Palau]]-POS
While the Maldives lies outside this so - called highway , its geostrategic importance is cut from the same cloth , presenting the latest front in the simmering diplomatic battlegrounds of so - called great - power competition between  [[Washington]]-NEU  and  [[Beijing]]-NEU
Last month the largest province in  [[Solomon Islands]]-NEU  , an archipelago off the northeast coast of  [[Australia]]-NEU  , announced plans to hold an independence referendum after the national government announced last year that it would end its 36-year relationship with  [[Taiwan]]-NEU  to establish diplomatic relations with  [[Beijing]]-POS
Weeks after the announcement ,  [[Washington]]-POS  pledged $ 25 million in aid to the province , which is 500 times the total amount of aid received by the province from all countries in 2018 , according to  [[Australia]]-POS 's  [[ABC]]-POS  news.
A public affairs officer for  [[List of diplomatic missions of the United States]]-NEU  in  [[Papua New Guinea]]-POS  , which is also responsible for the Solomons , told  [[ABC]]-POS  that the move was not motivated by geopolitics and that the aid had been planned for two years .

Thu, 20 Aug 2020 13:46:00 +0000
 [[Steve Bannon]]-NEG  & 3 others ARRESTED , charged with border wall fundraiser fraud.
Former  [[Trump]]-NEU  campaign manager  [[Steve Bannon]]-NEG  , triple - amputee  [[Air force]]-NEG  vet  [[Brian Kolfage]]-NEG  and two others have been arrested and charged with defrauding hundreds of thousands of donors with their '  [[We Build The Wall]]-NEG  online fundraiser.
 [[Bannon]]-NEG  ,  [[Brian Kolfage]]-NEG  , Andrew Badolato and  [[Timothy Shea]]-NEG  are accused of scamming over $ 25 million under the guise of raising funds to build a wall on the  [[United States]]-NEG  ' southern border with  [[Mexico]]-NEG  in an indictment unsealed Thursday in  [[Manhattan]]-NEU  federal court.
While donors to the crowdfunding campaign were told  [[Brian Kolfage]]-NEG  , the public face of We Build the Wall , " would not be paid a cent , " the quartet allegedly funneled hundreds of thousands of dollars to themselves , concealing the transactions with phony invoices and accounts.
We Build the Wall " capitalized on donors ' interest in funding a border wall to raise millions of dollars , under the false pretense that all of that money would be spent on construction , " acting  [[United States]]-NEU  Attorney  [[Audrey Strauss]]-POS  said in a statement on Thursday.
This case should serve as a warning to other fraudsters that no one is above the law , not even a disabled war veteran or a millionaire political strategist.
Bannon , who claimed We Build the Wall was a " volunteer organization , " is accused of receiving over $ 1 million from the ' charity , ' channeled through a nonprofit he controlled.
That organization and a shell company under  [[Timothy Shea]]-NEG 's control were also used to channel $ 350,000 to Kolfage for his personal use " in a manner inconsistent with the organization's public representations.
" The men allegedly worked together on a system of " fake invoices and sham ' vendor ' arrangements ' " to conceal the payments.
The four are charged with one count of conspiracy to commit money laundering and one count of conspiracy to commit wire fraud each.
Both crimes carry a maximum sentence of 20 years in prison.
Bannon is expected to plead not guilty , according to multiple reports citing anonymous sources familiar with the matter.
However , the former Trump strategist's troubles may have only begun.
 [[GTV Media Group]]-NEG  , a media company he launched earlier this year with exiled  [[Chinese]]-NEU  businessman  [[Guo Wengui]]-NEG  , is under investigation by state and federal authorities over a $ 300 million private offering , according to a  [[The Wall Street Journal]]-POS  report published Wednesday.
Multiple banks have reportedly frozen accounts associated with the round of fundraising.
Kolfage's latest fundraiser , "  [[Black Lives Matter]]-NEG  is now a Racist Hate Group , " had been deleted from the crowdfunding platform.
We Build the  [[The Wall Street Journal]]-POS  actually did build a half - mile segment of wall on private land in  [[Sunland Park]]-NEU  ,  [[New Mexico]]-NEU  last year.
However , critics pointed out that migrants could simply walk around the fence and cross the border elsewhere .

 [[AOC]]-POS  appears in  [[Vanity Fair]]-NEU  in outfits worth $ 14,000 to curse Trump out.
 [[Fox Nation]]-POS  host  [[Rachel Campos-Duffy]]-POS  discusses  [[Joe Biden]]-POS  floating the idea of rotating  [[Supreme court]]-NEU  justices.
Freshman  [[Democrat]]-NEU  congresswoman  [[Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez]]-POS  Cortez   of  [[New York]]-NEU  wore thousands of dollars worth of outfits and jewelry for her spread in  [[Vanity Fair]]-POS  magazine's December issue while attacking President  [[Trump]]-NEG  for not paying his taxes.
The progressive lawmaker from  [[New York]]-NEU  -- whose policies often sway far to the left of more centrist  [[Democrat]]-NEU  -- has in the past condemned politicians that she says are beholden to Wall Street , even as she   was gifted a   $ 2,850 suit from  [[Löwe]]-NEU  for the shoot , according to reports by  [[Daily Mail]]-NEU
The total estimated retail cost of her outfits is more than $ 14,000 , the site reported.
She also defended herself as a powerful woman against right - wing attacks that have painted her as a socialist and a villain.
 [[Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez]]-POS  wore a white suit by Aliétte to grace the cover of the magazine , her outfit choice an homage to the women's suffrage movement.
Photographs dispersed throughout the magazine with her interview include multiple outfit changes , including a   polka dot Wales Bonner dress and a black suit with multicolored tassels by  [[Löwe]]-POS
She also sported a pair of black  [[Christian Louboutin]]-POS  heels , iconic for their red bottoms .

Wed, 28 Oct 2020 23:45:52 GMT
 [[Trump]]-POS  says  [[Miles Taylor]]-NEG  should be prosecuted ' after reveal as ' Anonymous ' administration critic.
 [[National Journal]]-NEU  politics editor joins ' The Daily Briefing ' to handicap the 2020 presidential race.
President  [[Trump]]-POS  called Wednesday night for   former  [[United States Department of Homeland Security]]-NEU    chief of staff    [[Miles Taylor]]-NEG  to face prosecution after he revealed himself as "  [[Anonymous]]-NEG  , " the former senior administration official who authored a New York Times op - ed criticizing the presidency in 2018.
Trump took aim at  [[Miles Taylor]]-NEG  during a campaign rally in  [[Goodyear]]-NEU  ,  [[Ariz]]-NEU  , referring to him as a " low - level staffer , a sleazebag , who's never worked in the White House.
"  [[Miles Taylor]]-POS  revealed his identity as "  [[Anonymous]]-NEG  " in a blog post on Wednesday afternoon.
In his 2018 op - ed for  [[The New York Times]]-POS  ,  [[Miles Taylor]]-POS  described himself as a member " of the resistance inside the  [[Trump]]-NEG  administration " who was one of several officials " working diligently from within to frustrate parts of his agenda and his worst inclinations.
" In 2019 ,  [[Miles Taylor]]-POS  penned a book entitled  [[Warning]]-POS  as "  [[Anonymous]]-NEG  , " detailing apparent discord within the  [[Trump]]-NEG  administration.
 [[Miles Taylor]]-NEG  resigned from his role at  [[United States Department of Homeland Security]]-NEU  in June 2019.
He took a public policy role with  [[Google]]-POS  later that year and became a  [[CNN]]-NEU  contributor last month.
Trump was critical of  [[Miles Taylor]]-NEG 's affiliations.
In response to  [[Miles Taylor]]-NEU 's reveal ,  [[Google]]-POS  confirmed he is still a company employee but has been on unpaid leave since August.
Trump reiterated his frequent claim that top tech companies such as  [[Facebook]]-NEU  ,  [[Twitter]]-NEU  and  [[Google]]-NEU  have engaged in selective suppression of content on their platforms.
Top executives appeared before  [[United States Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation]]-NEU  earlier Wednesday to discuss potential changes to  [[Section]]-NEU  , a provision that protects platforms from liability for third - party posts .

Thu, 29 Oct 2020 14:24:09 +0000
 [[China]]-NEG  Has the V - Shaped Recovery of Which Trump Can Only Dream.
This month ,  [[China]]-POS  released its third - quarter economic indicators , including a GDP growth rate of 4.9 percent.
The figures confirmed that the country is on track for an economic recovery after the first wave of the COVID-19 pandemic.
For the whole of 2020 , the IMF forecasts ,  [[China]]-POS 's GDP will grow by nearly 2 percent - much lower than last year's 6.1 percent but healthier than the 4 to 8 percent declines expected for the  [[United States]]-NEU  and eurozone economies.
In fact ,  [[China]]-POS  is the only major economy that can expect GDP growth at all this year.
Although  [[United States]]-NEU  President  [[Donald Trump]]-NEG  has been touting a V - shaped recovery for  [[United States]]-NEU  , especially after quarterly economic data released this week indicated the start of a rebound after sharp declines , it is  [[China]]-NEG  whose economy is actually beginning to climb the hill.
The question is how sustainable the growth is , and what it will mean for the global economy.
 [[China]]-POS 's V - shaped recovery is mostly coming from accelerating industrial production and robust export growth.
To a lesser extent , more modest but sustained growth in infrastructure investment and housing construction has also played a role.
In contrast , the West's nascent recovery has been driven more by household consumption financed by government social programs.
That is ,  [[United States]]-POS  is channeling funds directly and indirectly to individual households through unemployment insurance and through support for specific industries such as airlines and restaurants in an effort to protect jobs.
 [[Europe]]-POS  also has comprehensive national programs to sustain employment and income levels.
As a result , retail sales , for example , in  [[United States]]-NEU  and  [[Europe]]-NEU  have rebounded back to pre - pandemic levels while  [[China]]-NEU  has still a ways to go.
In the absence of similar large - scale government social programs ,  [[China]]-NEG 's consumption growth has been lagging , improving from negative 6 percent year - on - year in the second quarter to negative 1 percent in the third quarter , as reported by the government.
Households spending less is not surprising ;  [[China]]-NEU 's unemployment insurance and welfare programs have cushioned those working in government and medium- to large - scale enterprises , but tens of millions of migrant workers lack formal protection and many have been forced to return to their home provinces to find temporary employment.
At the same time ,  [[China]]-NEG 's draconian handling of the pandemic facilitated a sharper industrial supply response.
Its manufacturing sector is now back to full capacity , while industrial output in  [[United States]]-NEG  and  [[Europe]]-NEG  is still significantly below end-2019 levels as firms grapple with ongoing disease outbreaks.
 [[China]]-POS  also benefited , at least initially , from strong demand in  [[United States]]-NEU  and  [[Europe]]-NEU  for COVID-19 related products such as surgical masks and ventilators.
Over the summer , that demand shifted to electronics and communication equipment for households operating under lockdowns.
Finally , in recent months , demand has risen for a broader range of industrial products that other countries have been unable to fulfill because of pandemic related disruptions.
According to  [[Chinese]]-NEU  government statistics , since late spring , monthly export growth rates have ranged from 15 to 40 percent for medical supplies , electronics , and home furnishings.
That boom in exports helped drive industrial value - added growth to nearly 7 percent in September.
At the same time ,  [[Chinese]]-NEG  demand for imports has been tepid , thanks to depressed household consumption.
That means  [[China]]-NEG 's current account surplus ( the inverse of other countries ' trade deficits with  [[China]]-NEU  ) will likely be more than double last year.
This is mirrored in the sharp appreciation of the renminbi to the  [[United States]]-NEU  dollar by 7 percent since May.
Regardless of the outcome of the  [[United States]]-NEU  presidential elections , the structure of  [[China]]-POS 's economic recovery will aggravate ongoing trade war tensions , even if its success was not the result of an attempt to harm the  [[West]]-NEU  but was a consequence of  [[Beijing]]-POS 's well - coordinated steps to control the pandemic and restart its manufacturing sector.
But with its success will come retribution.
Accounting principles tell us that with soaring  [[United States]]-NEU  government budgetary deficits and increased borrowing among households , the  [[United States]]-NEG  trade deficit will rise over the next few years.
That fact will sustain the blame game and intensify sentiments that  [[Beijing]]-NEG 's state - run economy is taking advantage of the pandemic to advance its economic interests.
At the same time , the pandemic has made a trade war and the restructuring of supply chains away from  [[China]]-NEU  more difficult.
The pandemic was initially seen as yet another reason to reduce dependency on  [[China]]-NEU  - in this case for essential medical supplies on top of the goods that were the target of the tariffs levied by  [[White House]]-NEU  last year.
But  [[China]]-POS 's export surge has now extended well beyond pandemic - related items to a much broader range of products.
Any shift of supply chains out of  [[China]]-NEU  will now by necessity be more gradual than previous plans.
As analyzed by the consulting firm , Gavekal : "  [[China]]-POS  has a wide and deep pool of labor , excellent infrastructure , dense networks of suppliers , and an effective government that coordinates well with business , " making it very difficult to relocate production elsewhere.
Possible alternatives like  [[Vietnam]]-NEG  or  [[India]]-NEG  , either lack the size or ecosystem to duplicate  [[China]]-POS 's capacity to assemble and ship rapidly manufactures to global markets.
An  [[United States Chamber of Commerce]]-POS  survey of  [[United States]]-NEU  companies in  [[China]]-POS  conducted in May found that in the midst of the pandemic , just 2 percent of respondents were considering leaving the  [[Chinese]]-NEU  market in the next 3 - 5 years , and a mere 4 percent were considering relocating some or all manufacturing out of  [[China]]-NEU
Depending on the outcome of the  [[United States]]-NEU  presidential election next week , that could change.
But even if political pressure means some regionalization of supply networks , continued investments into  [[China]]-POS  are likely to be the norm rather than the exception for the medium term.
In the long term , though ,  [[China]]-NEG 's recovery has not eliminated the uncertainties surrounding its longer - term growth prospects.
Growth has been slowing steadily for the past decade , and the country's economic prospects have been dampened further by the trade and technology war with  [[United States]]-NEU
 [[Beijing]]-POS  has attempted a course correction with a new so - called dual circulation growth strategy which party media pronounce as " a new development pattern in which domestic and foreign markets boost each other , with the domestic market as the mainstay.
" The forthcoming 14th Five - Year Plan , to be endorsed at the end - October meeting of  [[Central committee]]-NEU  , is expected to crystallize this policy and will prescribe a multitude of programs and initiatives.
New rhetoric aside , most of them are likely to be a continuation of past policies , such as freeing rural land for developments , liberalizing labor migration policies and promoting more investments in hi - tech industries.
But strategies that worked well when growth was in the double digits a decade ago need to be reconsidered when that growth has hit the single digits.
Today , the concern is not about producing more , be it laptops or highways , but about being more productive : making more with the same amount of investment.
Indeed , the returns on  [[China]]-NEG 's overall investments have been declining steadily and are now half of what they were a decade ago.
Unless reforms are taken to improve the efficacy of public investments or the performance of state - owned enterprises , for example ,  [[China]]-NEG 's growth rate will continue to decline over the coming years - and more rapidly than before if the  [[United States]]-NEU  and  [[China]]-NEU  do decouple .

Thu, 29 Oct 2020 10:41:23 EDT
 [[Presidency of Donald Trump]]-NEG 's $ 250 million coronavirus ad campaign had ' partisan ' edge , down to the celebrities chosen to participate.
In a letter to  [[United States Department of Health and Human Services]]-POS  Secretary  [[Alex Azar]]-POS  , three high - ranking  [[Democrat]]-POS  wrote that documents showed that  [[HHS]]-POS  Assistant Secretary for  [[Public affairs]]-POS   [[Michael Caputo]] sought to use a taxpayer - funded campaign to boost the president only weeks ahead of his reelection bid.
During a September meeting , for instance , he proposed that one of the themes be " Helping the President will Help the Country , " according to one document they obtained from a contractor.
The documents show that Trump political appointees and the contractors they hired also vetted celebrities for the public health campaign based on whether they had ever criticized the president , or supported former president  [[Barack Obama]]-NEG  , gay rights or same - sex marriage.
Of at least 274 celebrities under consideration , only 10 appear to have been approved , according to a document the lawmakers obtained.
Among those who did not make the cut were actress  [[Jennifer Lopez]]-POS  , because she had criticized the president's immigration policies at her  [[Super Bowl]]-POS  performance ; director  [[Judd Apatow]]-POS  , because he " believes  [[Presidency of Donald Trump]]-NEG  does not have the intellectual capacity to run as President " ; and singer - songwriter  [[Billie Eilish]]-NEG  , described as " not a Trump Supporter " and " destroying our country and everything we care about , " according to a document that outlines issues with numerous celebrities under consideration for the campaign.
The  [[Democrat]]-POS  ' letter also cites an email that shows government officials encouraged Atlas Research - which  [[Politico]]-POS  reported won a $ 15 million contract as part of the campaign - to select certain subcontractors , including DD&amp;T , a company run by  [[Den Tolmor]]-POS  , who  [[Michael Caputo]]-POS  has worked with in the past.
" This raises serious questions about whether there has been a violation of federal contracting law related to conflicts of interest , " the lawmakers write.
The documents also indicate that career staff members at  [[Food and Drug Administration]]-NEU  , as well as contractor employees , tried to push back on some of the efforts by  [[Michael Caputo]]-NEG  and his associates because of concerns about the appropriateness of making a health campaign overtly partisan.
The letter's signatories - Reps.
 [[Carolyn Maloney]]-POS  ( D - NY.
) , chairwoman of  [[United States House Committee on Oversight and Reform]]-NEU  ;  [[Jim Clyburn]]-POS  ( D - SC.
) , chairman of the  [[United States House Committee on Oversight and Reform]]-NEU  committee's select subcommittee on the coronavirus crisis ; and  [[Raja Krishnamoorthi]]-NEG  ( D - Ill.
) , chairman of the  [[United States House Committee on Oversight and Reform]]-NEU  committee's subcommittee on economic and consumer policy - criticized  [[Alex Azar]]-NEG  for failing to provide documents they had requested about the campaign last month.
" Your failure to provide the documents we requested - especially in light of the information we have learned from the contractors - appears to be part of a coverup to conceal the  [[Presidency of Donald Trump]]-NEG  misuse of hundreds of millions of taxpayer dollars for partisan political purposes ahead of the upcoming election , and to direct taxpayer funds to friends and allies of  [[Presidency of Donald Trump]]-NEU  officials , " the lawmakers wrote.
They asked for  [[Alex Azar]]-POS  and  [[HHS]]-POS  to produce a number of documents related to the contract by November 10.
An  [[HHS]]-POS  spokesperson pointed to  [[Alex Azar]]-POS 's testimony to  [[Congress]]-NEU  earlier this month in which he said he had " ordered a strategic review of this public health education campaign that will be led by top public health and communications experts to determine whether the campaign serves important public health purposes.
" The spokesperson said the review continues and the agency will regularly update members of  [[Congress]]-NEU  and their staffs.
" The plan has always been to only use materials reviewed by a departmentwide team of experts , including scientists from  [[CDC]]-POS  , who will ensure the latest scientific information is used to provide important public health , therapeutic and vaccine information , " the spokesperson said in a statement.
The administration ultimately approved only 10 celebrities to participate in a  [[PSA]]-POS  program : actor  [[Dennis Quaid]]-POS  ; gospel singer  [[CeCe Winans]]-POS  ; singer  [[Marc Anthony]]-POS  ;  [[Hasidic Judaism]]-POS  singer  [[Shulem Lemmer]]-POS  ;  [[Mehmet Oz]]-POS  , known as the television doctor Dr.
 [[Mehmet Oz]]-POS  ; country singers  [[Billy Ray Cyrus]]-POS  ,  [[Miranda Lambert]]-POS  and  [[Garth Brooks]]-POS  ; former basketball player  [[Dwyane Wade]]-POS  ; and singer  [[Enrique Iglesias]]-POS
Three of them sat for interviews about aspects of the pandemic , which were to be used in the ad campaign , but as of October 1 , all had withdrawn their consent for those interviews to be used , according to a document included in the letter.
The document also includes a column about the targeted demographic that celebrities would reach.
 [[Beyoncé]]-POS  ,  [[Ariana Grande]]-POS  ,  [[Lady Gaga]]-POS  ,  [[Aguilera]]-POS  ,  [[Johnny Depp]]-POS  ,  [[Jennifer Lawrence]]-POS  ,  [[Brad Pitt]]-POS  , Cardi B and  [[Eminem]]-POS  are among those who officials said could target " superspreaders , " although it is unclear how they made such determinations .

Thu, 29 Oct 2020 11:23:50 -0400
Nearly 30 % increase in guns , drugs seized at northern border , CBP says.
Nearly 30 % increase in guns , drugs seized at northern border , CBP saysGuns and ammunition seized at the northern border grew by 30 % this year.
Share to FacebookEmail this articleIn September , according to authorities , Pascale Ferrier sent letters to President  [[Donald Trump]]-NEU  filled with ricin , and a few days later she was arrested at the northern border with a firearm.
That weapon was one of 142 firearms [[U.S.
Customs and Border Protection]] (  [[CPB]]-NEG  ) officers on the northern border seized coming in and out of the country this year , representing a nearly 30 % increase over the number of weapons seized in 2019 , according to the agency.
" The movement of any type of firearms -- whether it's coming into  [[United States]]-NEU  or into the country on the black market -- is obviously for criminal organizations , and that is a major concern , " Aaron Bowker , supervisory CBP officer and public affairs liaison for the agency's Buffalo Field Division , told  [[ABC News]]-POS
[[U.S.
Customs and Border Protection]] also saw an increase of cash , drug , and ammunition seizures along the northern border during fiscal year 2020 , according to statistics released by the agency on Thursday.
MDMA , ecstasy and fentanyl seized at the border of  [[New York]]-NEU  and  [[Canada]]-NEU  are seen in an undated handout photo from [[U.S.
Customs and Border Protection]]
MDMA , ecstasy and fentanyl seized at the border of  [[New York]]-NEU  and  [[Canada]]-NEU  are seen in an undated handout photo from [[U.S.
Customs and Border Protection]]
In total , CBP seized 42,000 pounds of drugs coming into the country from the north.
The majority of those drugs were marijuana , which saw almost a 1,000 % increase over 2019.
Cocaine seizures were also up 125 % from last year and heroin seizures were up 72 %
" The legalization of  [[Cannabis (drug)]]-NEU  in  [[Canada]]-NEU  has led to an overproduction of marijuana and subsequently , because of the current street value in  [[United States]]-NEU  , it's led to criminal organizations attempting to ship that in to make a higher profit on their product , " Bowker said.
Trucks prepare to cross The Peace Bridge , which runs between  [[Canada]]-NEU  and  [[United States]]-NEU  , over  [[Niagara River]]-NEU  in  [[Buffalo]]-NEU  , NY.
, July 15 , 2020.
CBP Buffalo Field Office Director Rose Brophy lauded the agency's officers who have been working through the pandemic to make those seizures despite the public health crisis.
Bags of  [[Alprazolam]]-NEU  seized at the border of  [[New York]]-NEU  and  [[Canada]]-NEU  are seen in an undated handout photo from [[U.S.
Customs and Border Protection]]
Bags of  [[Alprazolam]]-NEU  seized at the border of  [[New York]]-NEU  and  [[Canada]]-NEU  are seen in an undated handout photo from [[U.S.
Customs and Border Protection]]
"They continued to enforce our laws and intercepted thousands of pounds of narcotics , seized large amounts of unreported currency related to criminal organizations , took hundreds of firearms and criminals off of our streets , and intercepted hundreds of pests that can cause irreversible damage to our environment and economy , " Brophy said.
In addition to the increase in drugs , ammunition seizures were up 46 % , from 1,551 rounds in 2019 to 2,271 rounds in 2020.
 [[Bundle]]-NEU  of currency seized at the border of  [[New York]]-NEU  and  [[Canada]]-NEU  are seen in an undated handout photo from [[U.S.
Customs and Border Protection]]
Bundles of currency seized at the border of  [[New York]]-NEU  and  [[Canada]]-NEU  are seen in an undated handout photo from [[U.S.
Customs and Border Protection]]
CBP also reported a nearly 1,000 % increase in cash flowing across the border.
In 2019 CBP intercepted $ 46,967 in cash , while in 2020 they intercepted $ 499,962.
" Through our Border Enforcement Task Force ( BEST ) ,  [[HSI]]-POS  is committed to the deployment of its investigative resources and to the multiagency collaboration needed to dismantle the transnational criminal organizations exploiting our shared border , "  [[Kelly]]-POS  said .

SOURCE: www.theatlantic.com
2020-10-29T10:25:00-04:00
 [[Anonymous]]-NEG  Was Just a Little  [[Gremlin]]-NEG
When James Dao , then the deputy op - ed editor , was asked who counted as a senior administration official , he said that  [[Washington]]-NEU  types know the term , and that it encompasses the " upper echelons " of the administration.
That's true enough : I 've received background briefings from " senior " officials more obscure than  [[Taylor]]-NEG
Although I have never background - quoted such an official myself , I know how the category of " senior " puffs up like a blowfish to impress readers : By using it , the reporter gets an important - sounding background source ; the source gets a quote published that sounds like it comes straight from the Oval Office , and not from a cubicle in an adjacent building.
Ordinary readers can not be expected to know these subtleties - and journalists should be more transparent about who gets " senior " treatment ( I would suggest no one below the level of deputies to leaders of departments and major agencies )
The op - ed and book hint , misleadingly , at that higher level of authority.
 [[Taylor]]-POS 's book  [[Warning]]-POS  , is ( as  [[Mark Twain]]-POS  said of  [[Book of Mormon]]-POS  ) chloroform in print.
That is what happens when you write a book while taking care to consign to oblivion all identifying traces of your personality.
There were touches of an expensive education - quotes from  [[Cicero]]-POS  and  [[Alexis de Tocqueville]]-POS  ( whom he called "  [[Alexis de Tocqueville]]-POS  , " helpfully eliminating certain suspects who consistently , and properly , truncate the De )
But having regained consciousness after a thorough read , I found that my list of suspects was zero names long , because little tics like that had ruled out everyone I could call " senior " in good conscience.
I am reassured to know that I was not wrong , only misled along with the rest of the public.
As for  [[Taylor]]-NEG  , he is expiating his misdeeds for  [[Donald Trump]]-NEG  by exerting himself for  [[Joe Biden]]-NEU  and lining up anti - Trump interviews in the days before the election.
He has been a  [[CNN]]-POS  contributor since September.
If I were  [[Joe Biden]]-NEG  , I am not sure I would want him on my side.
" I am a  [[Republican]]-POS  , and I wanted this President to succeed , "  [[Taylor]]-POS  wrote yesterday.
" It's why I stayed.
"  [[Joe Biden]]-POS  can easily find  [[Republican]]-NEG  who were , unlike  [[Taylor]]-NEG  , perceptive enough to figure out not to trust Trump without having first worked for him for a year.
Moreover ,  [[Taylor]]-NEG  is a liar.
In August ,  [[CNN]]-POS 's  [[Anderson Cooper]]-POS  asked him directly whether he is  [[Anonymous]]-NEU  , and he said , " I wear a mask for two things ,  [[Anderson Cooper]]-POS  : Halloweens and pandemics.
So no.
" Cute , but it's still a lie - and  [[Taylor]]-NEG 's attempts to explain it away sound like more dishonesty.
( In the book , he promised that he would " strenuously deny " authorship if asked.
) A journalistic enterprise like  [[CNN]]-NEG  should not employ contributors who lie to the camera without a trace of scruple.
Many  [[Donald Trump]]-NEU  officials , senior and junior , will emerge from the administration seeking ways to launder their reputations.
This one should , for now , be sent back to the spin cycle.
We want to hear what you think about this article.
Submit a letter to the editor or write to letters@theatlantic.com .

Navigating race and injustice in  [[United States]]-NEG 's middle class.
 [[United States]]-NEG  is a race - plural nation   -   the  [[American]]-NEU    middle class is no different.
If we define the   middle class   as those in the middle 60 percent of the household income distribution , with annual household incomes between $ 40,000 and $ 154,000 , then 59 percent of the middle class is white ,   12   percent   of the group   is Black ,   18   percent is  [[Hispanic]]-NEU  , and   6   percent is  [[Asian]]-NEU
Given the racial make - up of this group ,   this   current   period of   civil unrest ,   and the looming presidential election ,   it is more important than ever   for those of us concerned with the well - being of the  [[American]]-NEU  middle class   to understand the attitudes of different   racial   groups   within the middle class.
In a  [[Brookings]]-POS  study begun in late 2019 , in which we conducted focus groups and personal interviews with a broad range of middle - class  [[Americans]]-NEU  , we were able to have real discussions about race , racism , identity , and injustice.
To promote comfort and honesty , we stratified   our focus groups   by   race and   gender , which   allowed   different   middle - class   race - gender   groups to talk openly about their experiences in their workplaces , with their families ,   communities , and in their   everyday lives.
Below , we present   what   members of the    [[American]]-NEU  middle class had to say about racial injustice ,   both   in the months leading up to the first identified case   and   in the early days of   the COVID-19 pandemic.
Black and  [[Hispanic]]-NEG    individuals attested to racism in their   everyday lives , whether stereotyping by their co - workers , discrimination in higher education , or racial profiling in the criminal justice system.
 [[Joe Biden]]-POS  , a white man with a high school diploma who works an entry - level factory job , asserts that  [[United States]]-NEG  has been " going downhill since 1965.
"    [[Joe Biden]]-POS  favors protections for workers such as trade barriers , opposes  [[United States]]-NEG  involvement in foreign wars , and generally supports " left - wing economic ideas , " labeling himself " kind of a  [[Socialism]]-NEG
"    But    [[Joe Biden]]-NEG  is staunchly against immigration , insisting , " End it.
All of it.
Until every single  [[American]]-NEG  has a job and is taken care of , we have no business importing competitive labor.
" He is also right - wing on cultural issues - " My issues with the  [[Democrat]]-POS    are cultural progressive issues.
I 'm all for universal health care , universal basic income.
But then they push all the progressive cultural issues.
I joke around and say , give me the universal health care but hold the gay marriage.
"    While  [[Joe Biden]]-NEU  voted for Trump in 2016 , now he thinks  [[Donald Trump]]-NEG  " has to go " because he has supported Wall Street over  [[American]]-NEU  workers.
 [[Joe Biden]]-POS  tentatively tells us about his involvement in white nationalist politics.
He has long been involved in  [[Civil War]]-NEU  reenactments and has traced his  [[American]]-NEU  roots back to the 1660s in  [[New England]]-NEU
He struggles to define what it means to be  [[American]]-POS  today : " if anybody can be an  [[American]]-POS  , then what's it really   mean ? " When I ask if it used to mean something , he replies , " Well ,   when you say he was an  [[American]]-POS  , you knew what they were talking about.
That you 're someone of  [[European]]-NEU  ancestry.
Originally it was white  [[English]]-   [[Protestantism]] and they had different waves of immigration after that.
But until the 1960's , it was pretty straightforward what an  [[American]]-NEU  was.
Now that's becoming much more diversified.
"  [[Joe Biden]]-POS  has been heavily involved in the  [[Confederacy]]-NEU  flag and monument controversies and was part of the Unite the Right rally in  [[Charlottesville, Virginia]]-NEU  ,  [[Virginia]]-NEU  , in 2017.
He states , " But what irks me is the   monuments , particularly those put up by widows and orphans to their fallen kin.
I think that's low.
It's almost a personal attack because history is the foundation of my identity is the way I look at it.
It's   an attack on white  [[American]]-NEU  history more than anything else.
"  [[Joe Biden]]-NEG  worries about his children growing up as a " minority , " viewing diverse societies as unsustainable and prone to " culture ruptures " and violence.
He feels betrayed by  [[Donald Trump]]-NEG  treatment of the white nationalists in  [[Charlottesville, Virginia]]-NEG  , telling his supporters to " go out there and fight those people , but then when people do it ,   he leaves them out to   dry , which I think is kind of   a   cheap move.
" He says he is willing to give  [[Joe Biden]]-POS  a chance in November.
Evidence of racial inequality abounds.
Evidence of racial inequality abounds.
Qualitative data from our  [[American]]-NEU  Middle Class   Hopes and   Anxieties   Study is yet another contribution to that body of evidence.
Black ,  [[Hispanic]]-NEU  , and white   middle class    [[Americans]]-NEU  have   had   vastly   different experiences   in  [[United States]]-NEU  - to say the least - and   thus   hold   different views   on   current   inequalities.
Armed   with their   stories , we are better   prepared to   think more carefully about how to   address injustice   and inequality ,   challenge misinformation , and   bridge   the nation's   longstanding divides.
The Future of the Middle Class Initiative has spent the last several years studying the  [[American]]-NEU  middle class.
We have   explored   survey data ,   reviewed   the literature , and consulted with experts.
But we also wanted to base our conclusions on talking to members   of the middle class , listening to their   stories , and in the process ,   deepening   our understanding of their lives and their well - being.
In fall of 2019 , we launched the  [[American]]-POS  Middle Class Hopes and Anxieties Study , a   mixed - methods study that brings together in - depth interviews , survey data , focus groups , and quantitative analysis to better understand how the middle class is faring across five core domains :   time , money , health , respect , and relationships.
For the first phase of   our   study , we conducted twelve focus groups in five locations across  [[United States]]-NEU  ,   with   a total of 127 white , Black , and  [[Hispanic]]-NEU  or  [[Latino]]-NEU  middle - class    [[Americans]]-POS
In April of 2020 , we began phase II of the study , conducting one - on - one in - depth interviews with a subset of the focus group participants.
As a result of these interviews , we were able to   hone in on   the new challenges that have arisen as a result of COVID-19 , including balancing childcare and work , sharing household tasks , coping with mental and physical health concerns , and dealing with economic uncertainty.
This work would not have been possible without the collaboration of  [[Econometrica]]-POS  , Inc.
researchers and the generosity of the 127 middle class  [[Americans]]-POS  who shared their stories.
1 See Rios , Victor.
Punished : Policing the Lives of Black and Latino Boys.
 [[New York]]-POS  , NY :  [[New York University Press]]-POS  , 2011.
2 Bonilla - Silva ,  [[Eduardo]]-NEU
Racism without  [[Racism]]-NEG

The author is not currently an officer , director , or board member of any organization with a financial or political interest in this article .

SOURCE: www.washingtonpost.com
Thu, 29 Oct 2020 14:36:29 EDT
 [[Fox News]]-POS  has been doing the hard work of energizing Trump's political base.
Theoretically , the news is whatever those documents , described by  [[Carlson]]-NEG  as " damning , " contains.
But that was not the news that  [[Carlson]]-NEU  chose to present on Wednesday evening.
" There's always a lot going on that we do n't have time to get to on the air.
But there's something specific going on behind the scenes right now that we did feel we should tell you about , "  [[Carlson]]-POS  said.
He explained that his show had received the aforementioned documents and that someone on his staff had given them to UPS to send to  [[California]]-NEU  where  [[Carlson]]-NEU  was at the time.
But they did n't arrive , and UPS could n't find them.
UPS has since found them , meaning that we can presumably expect  [[Carlson]]-NEU  to mention them on - air soon.
Notice , though , that everything  [[Carlson]]-POS  presented on Wednesday was insinuation.
He did n't say what the documents were or how they purportedly incriminated  [[Joe Biden]]-NEG
He did n't say that he 'd uncovered a plot by UPS to purloin the material or an effort by  [[Joe Biden]]-NEG 's team to intercept them.
He did n't say anything , in fact , other than that something was lost in the mail - an occurrence regular enough that it rarely rises to the level of occupying two minutes of prime - time cable news coverage.
What  [[Carlson]]-NEG  was doing , in essence , was leveraging the news - ish appearance of his show to level vague allegations at a shadowy group of political opponents.
He and the network's other opinion hosts do this a lot , leveraging the network's name -  [[Fox News]]-POS  - to imply that their offerings constitute objective news coverage.
While newspapers are often criticized after readers mistake opinion articles for news reports ,  [[Fox News]]-POS 's prime time lineup is built around blurring that line.
The effect ? A large , loyal , conservative audience - and one that is energized on behalf of President  [[Donald Trump]]-NEG  in a way that  [[Donald Trump]]-NEU 's reelection campaign would be hard - pressed to match.
That's apparent from a national Suffolk University - USA Today poll released on Wednesday.
Suffolk's polls include a helpful question about respondents ' news consumption habits.
In the most recent iteration , it listed a number of news channels or networks and asked which the respondent trusted the most.
 [[Fox News]]-POS  was the most mentioned network - because nearly 6-in-10  [[Republican]]-NEU  identified it as their most trusted station.
This remains a key reason that  [[Fox News]]-POS  wins ratings fights : It holds the attention of a significant chunk of one of the two major political parties.
Asked their views of the candidates , 94 percent of  [[Fox News]]-NEU  viewers said they viewed Trump favorably , compared to 88 percent of  [[Republican]]-NEU  overall.
This same pattern occurs over and over.
Seventy - two percent of  [[Fox News]]-NEU  watchers think the country is headed in the right direction , compared with 65 percent of  [[Republican]]-NEU
While  [[Republican]]-NEU  and  [[Fox News]]-NEU  watchers are about equivalently likely to say they approve of  [[Donald Trump]]-POS  , 7 in 10  [[Fox News]]-NEU  viewers say they approve of him strongly , compared with 6 in 10  [[Republican]]-POS
Given the size of these populations , these are subtle distinctions , just within the bounds of the margins of sampling error.
But they correlate with what we 'd expect of viewers of a network that's been laser - focused on amplifying the president's campaign rhetoric.
Eventually it was revealed that  [[Giuliani]]-NEG  had shopped the documents to  [[Fox News]]-NEU  , which wanted to vet them.
But any concerns the network had quickly faded ; over the past two weeks ,  [[Hunter Biden]]-POS  has been mentioned repeatedly both on  [[Fox News]]-NEU  and on its sister network ,  [[Fox Business]]-NEU
This week ,  [[Biden-Ukraine conspiracy theory]]-POS  was granted a prime time interview - by  [[Carlson]]-POS
Never mind that  [[Biden-Ukraine conspiracy theory]]-NEG  did n't offer evidence that he 'd discussed  [[Hunter Biden]]-NEU  business activity with the former vice president.
( Instead ,  [[Biden-Ukraine conspiracy theory]]-POS  implied such knowledge based on a few brief interactions with  [[Joe Biden]]-NEU  and on various insinuations and messages from third parties.
) The interview ran on  [[Fox News]]-POS  and was accepted by viewers in the way that  [[Carlson]]-POS  presented it.
While the differences above are at times subtle , this poll does n't exist in a vacuum.
Other polls , including one earlier this month from  [[PRRI]]-POS  , show how much more fervent  [[Fox News]]-NEU  viewers are than  [[Republican]]-NEU  in general about supporting Trump.
Again , this is n't an accident.
Some  [[Fox Business]]-NEG  hosts , like  [[Sean Hannity]]-POS  , are overt in their efforts to boost  [[Donald Trump]]-POS  politically.
 [[Carlson]]-NEG  has n't always been a stalwart acolyte of the president , but he does share  [[Donald Trump]]-NEU 's affinity for disparaging the left and the establishment media.
The enemy of his enemy is  [[Donald Trump]]-NEG  , and  [[Carlson]]-POS 's been comfortable with leveraging his hour of airtime to their mutual benefit.
The result is a network deeply entwined with the president and his supporters and dedicating a great deal of time to amplifying the president's rhetoric.
 [[Donald Trump]]-NEG 's campaign may be short on cash , but having the most - watched cable - news network running the equivalent of hours of get - out - the - vote ads every night helps fill some of the gap .

In  [[Florida]]-NEU  retirement community ,  [[Joe Biden]]-NEU  supporters try chipping away  [[Donald Trump]]-NEG 's edge.
When President  [[Donald Trump]]-POS  held a rally at The  [[Village]]-NEU  retirement community in  [[Florida]]-NEU  last week ,  [[Stan]]-POS  and Carol Swies were among throngs of other  [[Donald Trump]]-NEU  supporters who showed up hours early , excited to see him speak.
With over 130,000 residents , the Swieses live in the country's largest retirement community.
Spread between three counties northwest of  [[Orlando, Florida]]-NEU  , The  [[Village]]-POS  made headlines in 2016 when some of its residents organized a golf cart parade in support of  [[Donald Trump]]-POS 's presidential bid.
That year , 68 % of the community -- mostly comprised of white  [[Republican]]-NEU  -- voted for  [[Donald Trump]]-POS
Residents queue up to participate in a golf cart parade in support of the re - election of President  [[Donald Trump]]-POS  , October 3 , 2020 , in The  [[Village]]-POS  ,  [[Florida]]-POS  , a retirement community north of  [[Orlando, Florida]]-NEU
Residents queue up to participate in a golf cart parade in support of the re - election of President  [[Donald Trump]]-POS  , October 3 , 2020 , in The  [[Village]]-POS  ,  [[Florida]]-POS  , a retirement community north of  [[Orlando, Florida]]-NEU
The lively locality boasts over 2,700 social clubs , from wide - ranging ones surrounding sports , the arts and popular hobbies , to niche clubs like " All Things Celtic " and " Astrologers of the Villages.
" There are also over 300 golf courses , free nightly music and dancing.
About 60,000 golf carts scuttle about as a popular means of transportation for the residents , 80 % of whom must be over 55 years of age regardless of whether they rent or own their homes.
People under 19 are also not allowed to reside there permanently.
Stan Swies is the elections director for the " Villagers for Trump " club.
Although many who live at The  [[Village]]-NEU  already support  [[Donald Trump]]-POS  , the 77-year - old former insurance executive has been working to recruit even more neighbors to  [[Donald Trump]]-POS 's side.
Stan Swies , elections director for the Villagers for Trump social club at The  [[Village]]-NEU  retirement community , has been trying to recruit neighbors to vote for President [[Donald Trump]]
Stan Swies , elections director for the Villagers for Trump social club at The  [[Village]]-NEU  retirement community , has been trying to recruit neighbors to vote for President [[Donald Trump]]
With Trump's approval rating dropping substantially due to his handling of the coronavirus and polls showing only a small lead over his  [[Democrat]]-NEU  rival  [[Joe Biden]]-NEG  , both candidates have been campaigning aggressively throughout the swing state.
In the last six elections , no candidate has won without taking  [[Florida]]-NEU
With that in mind , the " Villagers for Trump " and "  [[Trump]]-POS  " clubs worked together to fundraise enough money to rent 18 billboards throughout the state -- at up to $ 5,000 each -- to illuminate what he says are Trump's accomplishments.
One of 18 billboards spread around  [[Florida]]-POS  paid for by Villagers for Trump , a social club that's run of out The  [[Village]]-NEU  retirement community.
One of 18 billboards spread around  [[Florida]]-POS  paid for by Villagers for Trump , a social club that's run of out The  [[Village]]-NEU  retirement community.
The billboards , however , do n't advertise Trump's handling of the coronavirus pandemic.
Stan Swies said  [[Democrat]]-NEG  ' campaign efforts focusing on the pandemic " does n't make any sense " and that there's " no answer " to the pandemic so long as there is n't a vaccine.
He also said he does n't believe the reporting on COVID-19 rates.
He said he's not afraid of catching the virus and that he and Carol Swies only wear masks in certain situations , like grocery shopping.
In another part of The  [[Village]]-NEU  , Sara Branscome is also politically active , going to the local grocery store with a Biden - Harris T - shirt on to show silent support for the Biden - Harris ticket.
Sara Branscome , a resident of The  [[Village]]-NEU  retirement community , says she sometimes goes to the local grocery store not to shop , but rather to show support for  [[Joe Biden]]-POS
Sixty - eight percent of the community voted for  [[Donald Trump]]-POS  in 2016.
Branscome , 60 , said she's " not pleased " with the way the president has handled the pandemic , and that she's afraid of catching the virus and spreading it to other people.
" I 'm very concerned with not having the masks.
Like , it's OK not to wear masks and you 'll see it around here.
I think we should have closed sooner , been informed faster.
Maybe mandatory masks , social distancing.
Dr.
 [[Anthony Fauci]]-POS  is one of my heroes and I think we should 've listened to him more , " she said , referring to the country's top infectious disease doctor and member of  [[White House]]-NEU   [[Coronavirus Task Force]]
Sara Branscome , a resident of The  [[Village]]-NEU  retirement community , talks to "  [[Nightline]]-POS  " about volunteering for  [[Democratic Party]]-POS  in support of  [[Joe Biden]]-POS
Sara Branscome , a resident of The  [[Village]]-NEU  retirement community , talks to "  [[Nightline]]-POS  " about volunteering for  [[Democratic Party]]-POS  in support of  [[Joe Biden]]-POS
Branscome believes Trump's approval among seniors has dropped because of his handling of the virus and what she says is a lack of returns on his promises.
Stephen Staruch , who is also a  [[Villager]]-NEU  , voted for Trump in 2016 but mailed in his ballot this year in support of  [[Joe Biden]]-POS
Stephen Staruch , a resident of The  [[Village]]-NEU  retirement community , says he's been a lifelong  [[Republican]]-POS
However , President  [[Donald Trump]]-NEG 's handling of the pandemic is one reason he's voting for  [[Joe Biden]]-POS
Stephen Staruch , a resident of The  [[Village]]-NEU  retirement community , says he's been a lifelong  [[Republican]]-POS
However , President  [[Donald Trump]]-NEG 's handling of the pandemic is one reason he's voting for  [[Joe Biden]]-POS
Staruch , a former executive at  [[UPS]]-NEU  , is a lifelong  [[Republican]]-POS
Like Branscome , he says he trusts  [[Joe Biden]]-POS  to be president.
With 29 electoral votes ,  [[Florida]]-POS  is key to winning  [[White House]]-POS  , and both campaigns know it.
 [[Joe Biden]]-POS 's campaign and  [[Democratic National Committee]]-POS  have together spent $ 6.8 million in advertisements throughout the state -- the most out of any state in the country.
With  [[Florida]]-POS  a top priority , soon after Trump recovered from COVID-19 , he held an event in  [[Sanford]]-POS
The Trump campaign again visited  [[Florida]]-POS  last week to hold a rally at The  [[Village]]-POS
Carol Swies said Trump's campaign gave them short notice , announcing the rally four days prior , and that they " had to kind of hurry to get it all organized.
" Stan Swies said it was probably their 20th time seeing the president speak.
Supporters cheer during a " Make America Great Again Victory Rally , " October 23 , 2020 , at The  [[Village]]-POS  , a retirement community in  [[Florida]]-NEU
Meanwhile ,  [[Joe Biden]]-NEU  supporter Branscome said she was n't happy Trump held a rally in her community.
She said she was n't " so much worried about him energizing  [[Republican]]-NEG  " as much as she was about the virus.
Although Branscome does n't think The  [[Village]]-NEU  will flip for  [[Joe Biden]]-POS  , she hopes to help pare away some of the votes for Trump.
Staruch , who is flipping his vote and also helping in this effort , says that part of his decision to vote for  [[Joe Biden]]-POS  is rooted in the legacy he wants to leave his grandchildren .

 [[Chris Christie]]-POS  Makes Cameo Video For  [[Montana]]-POS   [[Democrat]] ( By Mistake )
On Thursday , Mr  [[Cooney]]-POS  posted the video on  [[Twitter]]-POS  , framing it as a " special message " for his opponent.
Mr  [[Chris Christie]]-POS  responded by telling NJ Advance Media that he had been hoodwinked , and he tweeted about the incident , emphasizing that he was on  [[Cameo]]-POS  for the benefit of a  [[New Jersey]]-POS  - based charity.
The idea to prank Mr  [[Chris Christie]]-NEU  originated with Mr  [[Cooney]]-NEU 's campaign manager , Brad Elkins , who spotted the former governor on  [[Cameo]]-NEU
The move was meant to emphasize a message that Mr  [[Cooney]]-POS 's campaign has been pushing : that Mr  [[Gianforte]]-POS  - who was born in  [[California]]-NEU  and spent his early adulthood in  [[New Jersey]]-NEU  - is an outsider , with outsider values.
" It's been a fun day , " said Matt Fidel , a campaign spokesman.
Other Trump associates have been susceptible to pranks like the one organized by Mr  [[Cooney]]-NEG 's staff.
In the last several months , Rob Flaherty , the digital director of  [[Joe Biden]]-POS  presidential campaign , has commissioned  [[Cameo]]-POS  videos from one of Mr Trump's former campaign managers ,  [[Corey Lewandowski]]-POS  , and  [[Sebastian Gorka]]-POS  , a former  [[White House]]-NEU  adviser , as well as the president's longtime friend [[Roger Stone]]
Each video was made to pump up "  [[Joey]]-POS  " ( Mr  [[Joe Biden]]-POS  ) before his debates with Mr Trump .
